summary: Test module that defines dummy components and a suite of unit and integration tests for the Kandinsky V2.2 inpainting pipeline, covering functionality, performance, mixed‑precision inference, batch processing, CPU offloading, serialization, and result verification.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and stability of the Kandinsky V2.2 inpainting pipeline within the diffusers library, enabling reliable releases and easier maintenance for developers and end‑users.
